references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
prog: (PARI) \Same numbers flipped over flipover(n) = { local(flag,x,j,sx,v,d); for(x=0,n, sx = Str(x); v = Vec(sx); for(j=1,length(sx), d = v[j]; if(d=="0"||d=="1"||d=="3"||d=="8",flag=1,flag=0;break); ); if(flag,print1(x",")) ) } (Cino Hilliard)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
